title: Started Bachelor's of Software Engineering
description: Embarked on my academic journey in Canada, enrolling in the Bachelor of Software Engineering program at the University of Victoria.

title: First Team Hackathon (Victoria Hand Project)
description: Competed in my first team-based health hackathon, collaborating to develop innovative solution for the Victoria Hand Project.

title: First and Second Co-op at Noratek Solutions
description: Completed my first two professional co-op terms as a Software Application Developer at Noratek Solutions Inc., gaining extensive hands-on experience.

title: First Full-Stack Team Project
description: Collaborated with a team to successfully design, develop, and launch my first full-stack application, Triqa, from concept to completion. View on GitHub.

title: Third Co-op at University of Victoria
description: Completed my third co-op as a Learning Technology Assistant at the University of Victoria, applying my skills to enhance educational technology platforms.

title: Capstone Project - Schedulator
description: Led and collaborated with a team of software engineers on our capstone project, 'Schedulator', developing a complex backend API and managing the project with Agile principles. View on GitHub.

title: Final Co-op at BC Pension Corporation
description: Completed my final 4-month co-op as a Junior Security Analyst at BC Pension Corporation, while concurrently finishing all my degree requirements.

title: First CodeHack by Island Health
description: Participated in the annual CodeHack sponsored by Island Health, developing innovative solutions for pressing healthcare challenges.

title: Convocation & First Career Job
description: Graduated with a Bachelor's in Software Engineering and immediately launched my professional career as a Systems Analyst at Brentwood College School.

title: Second CodeHack - 2nd Place Winner
description: Returned to the Island Health CodeHack, where my team secured 2nd place for developing an innovative and impactful health-tech solution.
